11 #define BOOT_STAGE_OFFSET 28
12 #define PLAT_OFFSET 24
13 #define HW_BLOCK_OFFSET 16
14 
15 #define HSP_BOOT_STAGE_0SP (0 << BOOT_STAGE_OFFSET)
16 #define HSP_BOOT_STAGE_1SP (1 << BOOT_STAGE_OFFSET)
17 #define HSP_BOOT_STAGE_2SP (2 << BOOT_STAGE_OFFSET)
18 
19 #define ANALOG_DEVICES_PLAT (1 << PLAT_OFFSET)
20 
21 #define HSP_PLATFORM ANALOG_DEVICES_PLAT
22 
23 #define HW_GENERIC (1 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
24 #define HW_FUSE_CTRL (2 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
25 #define HW_CRYPTO (3 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
26 #define HW_MBOX (4 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
27 #define HW_PMP (5 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
28 #define HW_VENDOR_HW (6 << HW_BLOCK_OFFSET)
